ygData.subject: Re: Pokemon (Blue)  Query
ygData.msgSnippet: You talking about Cerulean City? Go up first through an entrance which comes to a bridge with a lot of other trainers. Just continue on the path until you find
ygData.messageBody:
You talking about Cerulean City? Go up first through an entrance which comes
to a bridge with a lot of other trainers. Just continue on the path until
you find Bill. Help him change back into human and he gives you a ticket for
the ship. Then go back to town and find a building with a policeman standing
outside it. Go in and at the back, theres a part of the wall that is
missing, just go in that part and continue on.

Leshrec
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Pokemon (Blue) Query

>
> I'm now stucked. ;( I fight thru' the tunnel that contain moonstone and
> fossil. Becoz my pokemon is near to death, I quickly jump, jump and jump
> across all grass to find the next town to get a pokemon center. After
> healing all my pets, I then realised I'm stucked in that town (since I can
> only jump down but not up)! I dun have the CUT HM and I can't cut across
> the tree. Any idea I can get out of the town?
>
> I got few HMs so far, like watergun (ok Garren dun let ya imagination run
> wild again pls, hehe), lighting something etc. H/w, all my 6 pokemons
> already got 3-4 skills. I dunno which shld to learn the new skills. I
> worry I will find some pokemon more powerful and I will have to switch to
> them. If that's so, those HM will be wasted.
>
> Thx.
>
>

earth

> > > Earth good against physical attacks like scratch but weak against
water
> > > Still got some others but I can't remember, maybe try searching the
> web.
> > > 5.If you complete finish liao, DON'T use the megaball on anything less
> than
> > > a mewtwo, since the megaball is 100% catch. Btw, the blue and red no

> same,
